life.desc: How long you can control your bot/ how many actions you can make.

strength.desc: Effects wheel speed, arm strength, grip strength, etc.

speed.desc: Effects how quickly your bots attachments can move.

strength.desc: The strength of arms, grips, and speed of wheels.

durabitity.desc: How long an attachment will last before breaking.

mass.desc: How much weight the attachment will have.

size.desc: How clunky the attachment will be.
